name: dtrucor2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

|- wa(w0, wn(w0))
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

|- wa(w0, wn(w0))

-| wn(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))

comment: The theorem form of the deduction ~ dtrucor leads to a contradiction, as mentioned in the "Wrong!" example at ~ mmdeduction.html#bad . (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2007.)
